statements: UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New message' WHERE notification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE notifications SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = '876e23bf-f03a-4e0b-9a5c-50d090aa4e1e';
UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New message', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE notifications SET message = 'Updated message', user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE notification_id = '1e860f3f-4a3d-4795-8390-17e3f768c4d3'
UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New message' WHERE notification_id = 1;
UPDATE user_settings SET notification_threshold = 5, enable_notifications = false WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New message', created_at = NOW() WHERE notification_id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
UPDATE user_settings SET notification_threshold = 10, enable_notifications = TRUE, notification_frequency = 'Daily' WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE notifications SET message='New message for user 1' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE users SET lighting_preference='Warm light' WHERE user_id=2;

UPDATE lighting_devices SET brightness=80 WHERE device_id=3;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', timezone = 'GMT' WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
